"Room Matching Settings": "Room Matching Settings allow you to set a password for a Room in your Section, in order to only match with players who have set the same password."

"If you want to set a Room Password, open the Main Menu, select \"Communication\", then select \"Room Matching Settings\" and set a Room Password.

Opening Room Matching Settings again and deleting the Room Password will change the Room back to normal matching."

"If you want to join a Room that has a Password set, go to the Section where the Room is located, open Room Matching Settings and enter the Room Password.

※If another Party Member has set a different Password, you will not be able to join the same Room as each other.
※You cannot move to a Room with a Password set within ARKS bases."
